question: 1 The squirrels need to get in the same order as their burrows using flex-direction. This CSS property defines the direction items are placed in the container, and accepts the following values:
insight: row: Items are placed the same as the text direction. row-reverse: Items are placed opposite to the text direction. column: Items are placed top to bottom. column-reverse: Items are placed bottom to top.

question: 2 The squirrels need to get in the same order as their burrows using flex-direction. This CSS property defines the direction items are placed in the container, and accepts the following values:
insight: row: Items are placed the same as the text direction. row-reverse: Items are placed opposite to the text direction. column: Items are placed top to bottom. column-reverse: Items are placed bottom to top.
